content: Should self-link be returned when _summary=count or _summary=text is specified? I feel like it should be returned since the number of results could change based on what search parameter was actually being applied. The spec (http://hl7.org/fhir/search.html#summary) doesn't specifically call this out, however.
It should be returned. If you think it's not clear, you can submit a change request to make it explicit
